channel.title: Friends Getting "Error Connecting To Server" Please Help!
channel.description:
Ok so i have trisidiax v2 source and client and im running my source, my DUC (no-ip) is on, i changed 127.0.0.1 to my no-ip in client.java on server side and client side, i port forwarded 43594 and canyouseeme.com can see me through that port, my client is compressed in a jar file, my friends have the cache in their C drive.
Why is it still not working..

item.title: Friends Getting "Error Connecting To Server" Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @tgm_clan tgm clan
item.description:
@tgm_clan wrote:

Pm me i will try to help.
